rows.label: qst200223_msg0001
rows.name:
Harghal, why are you
dying your hands in such evil deeds?

rows.label: qst200223_msg0002
rows.name:
Everyone[ML:Dash ]
Couche and your mother too
are worried about you, you know?

rows.label: qst200223_msg0004
rows.name:
If this job succeeds,
I'll get a large sum of money.

rows.label: qst200223_msg0005
rows.name:
Fraudrinco has 10 times the effect
of Pollen Orbs, you know?

rows.label: qst200223_msg0007
rows.name:
If they know the effect of this drink,
many people will trade for it
at a high price.

rows.label: qst200223_msg0008
rows.name:
If that happens, even without Bahn,
I won't be troubled for money anymore.

rows.label: qst200223_msg0009
rows.name: Why are you so obsessed with money!

rows.label: qst200223_msg0010
rows.name:
Why, you ask?
Because without money
I can't do anything!

rows.label: qst200223_msg0011
rows.name:
To obtain happiness,
money is necessary.

rows.label: qst200223_msg0012
rows.name:
If you met my mother, you know, right?
Money is necessary to cure her illness!

rows.label: qst200223_msg0013
rows.name:
Who are you to say that!?
Always justice, justice!

rows.label: qst200223_msg0014
rows.name:
Even I know that
smuggling is a bad thing!
But, it can't be helped!

rows.label: qst200223_msg0016
rows.name:
Do you really believe you
can become happy
with money earned like this!?

rows.label: qst200223_msg0017
rows.name:
Do you really think you
can make someone happy
with such dirty money?!
